"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ceffa8636872631fd20600#post_54ceffa8636872631fd20600
Not gonna happen. Even if it somehow manages to knock everyone's socks off (which is unlikely given that the source material sucks) it will never be this really great porno, it'll be a really great erotic thriller.

That's what a sexy movie is when people who don't normally watch sexy movies like it, sort of like how a horror movie that non-horror fans like is a suspense thriller.
